# Inflict Moderate Wounds (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 300

This spell functions like *[[Inflict Light Wounds (Spell)|inflict light wounds]]*, except that you 2d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +10).
